sentence.Network_en: Older mothers tend to be too idealistic about the pleasures of motherhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 较年长的母亲往往对身为人母的乐趣过于理想化。

sentence.Network_en: Women who put off having a baby often make the best mothers.
sentence.Network_cn: 晚育的女性经常会成为最优秀的母亲。

sentence.Network_en: Ninety per cent of lone parent families are headed by mothers.

PerfectNetExp.abs: You are mothers or fathers , or ask a friend to help ., 你是准妈妈还是准爸爸 , 还是帮朋友问.

some pregnant mothers have an instinctive reaction avoid food or drink that could be harmful to the fetus . they may be revolted by the smell of alcohol or seafood , meat or mushrooms .一些怀孕的母亲会有一些本能反应，拒绝吃可能对胎儿有害的食物和饮品，一闻到酒精或者海鲜、肉和蘑菇等就会感到恶心。
Survival of triplets who are born to teen mothers in the United States ., 美国未成年母亲所生三胞胎的生存情况.

it does not matter whether she is a bussiness executive an hourly laborer , or an unpaid stay-at-home mom -- the best mothers invest the best of themselves in their families .无论母亲是一名商业管理者，国家时薪的工人，还是没有收入的家庭主妇--最好的母亲都为家庭倾注了所有。

entry.def: Your mother is the woman who gave birth to you. You can also call someone your mother if she brings you up as if she was this woman.

example.ex: She sat on the edge of her mother's bed...
She's an English teacher and a mother of two children...
example.tran: 她是英语教师，还是两个孩子的母亲。

entry.def: If a woman mothers a child, she looks after it and brings it up, usually because she is its mother.

example.ex: Colleen had dreamed of mothering a large family.
example.tran: 科琳曾梦想抚养一群孩子。

entry.def: If you mother someone, you treat them with great care and affection, as if they were a small child.

example.ex: She felt a great need to mother him...
example.tran: 她迫切地感到要细心照料他。

auth_sentence.content: So they have a reputation as very cold-hearted mothers.

Sentence.sentence: Mothers are far more likely than fathers to take advantage of this law,But extended leaves and part-time employment are known to be harmful to careers—for both genders.

When the Pew Research Center recently asked American parents to identify their"ideal"life arrangement,47 percent of mothers said they would prefer to work park-time and 20percent said they would prefer not to work at all
Most mothers do not aspire to (向往) elite,competitive full-time positions: the Swedish policies have given them the freedom and opportunity to live the lives they prefer.
